meta.title: The Shattered Hourglass
meta.notes: Hogwarts mystery with time distortions. Familiar names included as cameos. Abilities 0–30 (sum 120). Hidden skill-gated options. Multiple endings.

rules.check: total = d20 + floor(ability/5); success if total >= dc
rules.win_condition: Reach a positive ending with all abilities > 0

scenes.title: Breakfast Backwards
scenes.description: In the Great Hall, rain patters upward and a few students repeat the same spoonful of porridge twice. Headmistress McGonagall calls for calm.
scenes.background: Candles sputter in drafty corridors; portraits trade worried glances as hourglasses shed sand upward.

choices.option: Appeal to McGonagall for permission to investigate

success.narration: Her gaze is stern but trusting: 'Use your head before your wand.'

failure.narration: She thins her lips: 'Stay clear of staff-only areas.'

choices.option: Analyze the anomaly pattern among the hourglasses

success.narration: You chart the reversals—Gryffindor’s sand ticks odd minutes.

failure.narration: The pattern eludes you as the ceiling clouds roll backward.

scenes.title: Stairs that Think
scenes.description: The moving staircases pause, then lurch in odd sequences; steps flicker like bad memory.
scenes.background: Candles sputter in drafty corridors; portraits trade worried glances as hourglasses shed sand upward.

choices.option: Dash across before the shift

success.narration: You time your steps; the staircase carries you true.

failure.narration: A rattle of chains; you grab a banister just in time.

choices.option: Mark rotations and predict their logic

success.narration: Your quick sketch reveals a safe landing at the fifth turn.

failure.narration: A miscalculation strands you at a dead-end balcony.

scenes.title: The Fat Lady’s Worry
scenes.description: The Fat Lady’s portrait trembles in her frame. 'Someone keeps asking for the password before they arrive,' she whispers.
scenes.background: Candles sputter in drafty corridors; portraits trade worried glances as hourglasses shed sand upward. The fire crackles in familiar rhythms—off by a heartbeat.

choices.option: Soothe the portrait’s nerves

success.narration: She settles: 'Look to the old clock by the hearth.'

failure.narration: She sniffs: 'Come back with better manners.'

choices.option: Examine the portrait hinges and canvas edges

success.narration: A faint glittering dust—Time-Turner residue?

failure.narration: Only ordinary varnish under your nails.

choices.option: Slip past quietly when she peeks away (Stealth)

success.narration: You slide in as the frame swings; no alarm raised.

failure.narration: She tuts loudly; everyone turns.

scenes.title: A Hearth Out of Step
scenes.description: Your House common room feels almost right, except the clock by the hearth clicks twice at once.
scenes.background: Candles sputter in drafty corridors; portraits trade worried glances as hourglasses shed sand upward. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow. The fire crackles in familiar rhythms—off by a heartbeat.

choices.option: Tune your senses to the tick (Attunement)

success.narration: For a moment, the ticks align and point toward the library.

failure.narration: The tick splits again; you lean on will alone.

choices.option: Question your roommates about oddities

success.narration: A friend swears they saw tomorrow’s sunrise. Library whispers follow.

failure.narration: Murmurs and shrugs; no one wants to look foolish.

scenes.title: To the Library, Twice
scenes.description: Madam Pince looks the same and not—she is in two places at once for a blink. 'Be quick,' she says, both voices overlapping.
scenes.background: Candles sputter in drafty corridors; portraits trade worried glances as hourglasses shed sand upward. Dust hangs like fog; books murmur when your back is turned.

choices.option: Request Restricted Section access (Persuasion)

success.narration: Your sincerity wins a grudging nod and a stamped slip.

failure.narration: She waves you to the ordinary stacks only.

choices.option: Note the doubled shadow and follow it

success.narration: It leads toward Charms tomes with broken clasps.

failure.narration: It dissipates among Divination periodicals.

scenes.title: Stacks A: Overdue Whispers
scenes.description: Shelves breathe dust; the ink in some spines crawls backward into the bottles.
scenes.background: Candles sputter in drafty corridors; portraits trade worried glances as hourglasses shed sand upward. Dust hangs like fog; books murmur when your back is turned.

choices.option: Search logically through catalog runes

success.narration: Cross-references point toward temporal hexes.

failure.narration: Runes blur as if shy; you misfile your own note.

choices.option: Hide from Pince’s patrol behind rolling ladders

success.narration: You slide under a cart as she glides past.

failure.narration: Your shoe squeaks; she frowns deeply.

scenes.title: Stacks B: Charms That Remember
scenes.description: Charms books hum like beehives. Flitwick’s tidy annotations mention 'chronal resonance'.
scenes.background: Candles sputter in drafty corridors; portraits trade worried glances as hourglasses shed sand upward. Dust hangs like fog; books murmur when your back is turned.

choices.option: Annotate a counter-charm sequence

success.narration: You copy a clear pattern that could anchor time.

failure.narration: Your pen blotches; you lose a line to smudged ink.

choices.option: Balance along the ladder rails to a high shelf

success.narration: The topmost tome falls neatly into your arms.

failure.narration: You wobble; the shelf thumps ominously.

scenes.title: Restricted: The Sighing Chains
scenes.description: Chains on grim tomes rattle to a rhythm you don’t hear. A portrait of Phineas Nigellus narrows his eyes.
scenes.background: Candles sputter in drafty corridors; portraits trade worried glances as hourglasses shed sand upward. Dust hangs like fog; books murmur when your back is turned.

choices.option: Decipher an old Ministry memo on Time-Turners (Arcana)

success.narration: You glean procedures for safe containment.

failure.narration: Jargon tangles; you only catch warnings.

choices.option: Distract the portrait with clever flattery (Deception)

success.narration: Flattered, he sniffs but divulges a hidden note.

failure.narration: He calls you transparent and looks away.

scenes.title: 'Mind the Rules'
scenes.description: Madam Pince glides by like a disapproving swan. 'Treat the books with respect—time has been unkind enough.'
scenes.background: Candles sputter in drafty corridors; portraits trade worried glances as hourglasses shed sand upward. Dust hangs like fog; books murmur when your back is turned.

choices.option: Promise care and ask for guidance

success.narration: She softens: 'Clocktower records, if you must.'

failure.narration: Her frown deepens; you move on quickly.

scenes.title: Gathering Sand
scenes.description: You piece together rumors: an experimental hourglass in the old clocktower once stabilized misfired spells.
scenes.background: Candles sputter in drafty corridors; portraits trade worried glances as hourglasses shed sand upward. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Commit the counter-charm pattern to memory

success.narration: The rhythm settles under your skin like a heartbeat.

failure.narration: The rhythm stutters; you catch only the cadence.

choices.option: Sketch a route to the tower avoiding staff areas

success.narration: You map a discreet night path past armor stands.

failure.narration: Your map is messy; you’ll improvise.

scenes.title: Filch & Mrs Norris
scenes.description: Argus Filch prowls with Mrs Norris, eyes gleaming. 'Out of bounds?' he rasps.
scenes.background: Candles sputter in drafty corridors; portraits trade worried glances as hourglasses shed sand upward.

choices.option: Talk your way out with prefect-ish confidence

success.narration: Filch squints: 'Off you go, then—keep your nose clean.'

failure.narration: 'Detention,' he growls. You bolt when his shoe squeaks.

choices.option: Slip behind a suit of armor

success.narration: You vanish as Mrs Norris blinks slow approval.

failure.narration: A visor clangs; Filch herds you toward Pomfrey.

scenes.title: Madam Pomfrey’s Concern
scenes.description: The Hospital Wing glows warm. 'You look peaky,' Madam Pomfrey says, handing you a steaming vial.
scenes.background: Stone smells of rain and ink; the castle’s bones creak with remembered footsteps. The ward smells of dittany and clean linen; quiet courage hums.

choices.option: Accept the tonic and ask about time-sick students

success.narration: She nods: 'Two lost an afternoon. Be careful in the clocktower.'

failure.narration: She tuts and waves you away to rest.

choices.option: Examine the vial’s shimmer for chronal traces

success.narration: A micro-glitter: stabilization essence.

failure.narration: It’s just restorative—nothing temporal.

scenes.title: Corridor of Watching Armor
scenes.description: Helmets track your footsteps. One suit salutes a moment before you pass it.
scenes.background: Stone smells of rain and ink; the castle’s bones creak with remembered footsteps. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Sprint between waxed floor patches

success.narration: You glide like a silent charm.

failure.narration: A skid bumps your shoulder.

choices.option: Calm the armor with a respectful bow

success.narration: Metal hands relax; a panel slides aside.

failure.narration: The visor fogs with resentment.

scenes.title: Base of the Clocktower
scenes.description: Gears groan above. The door is barred with a charm that smells like ozone.
scenes.background: Stone smells of rain and ink; the castle’s bones creak with remembered footsteps. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Counter the locking charm (Arcana)

success.narration: The sigil unwinds with a sigh.

failure.narration: The charm spits; your fingers tingle.

choices.option: Brace and lift the physical bar

success.narration: Muscles and grit prevail.

failure.narration: The bar scrapes like a scream; your arms ache.

scenes.title: Mezzanine of Echoes
scenes.description: You catch your own footstep arriving before you lift your foot. A faint laugh: Peeves.
scenes.background: Stone smells of rain and ink; the castle’s bones creak with remembered footsteps. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Out-trick Peeves with a riddle and a dare

success.narration: He cackles and shoves a lever into place for you.

failure.narration: Peeves pelts you with chalk; you cough and push on.

choices.option: Time your movements to the gear rhythm

success.narration: You step when the world blinks; platforms align.

failure.narration: You misstep; a gear teeth-kiss clips your sleeve.

scenes.title: Gantry Over the Pendulum
scenes.description: A colossal pendulum scythes, sometimes twice in the same swing.
scenes.background: Stone smells of rain and ink; the castle’s bones creak with remembered footsteps. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Leap between sweeps

success.narration: Your feet touch metal only where it will be.

failure.narration: A near miss rattles your bones.

choices.option: Wedge a stop with a pry bar

success.narration: The pendulum shudders and slows.

failure.narration: The bar skitters away with a clang.

scenes.title: Portrait of Albus Dumbledore
scenes.description: Dumbledore’s painted eyes twinkle with concern. 'Time dislikes fuss. What you need is harmony.'
scenes.background: Stone smells of rain and ink; the castle’s bones creak with remembered footsteps. Dust hangs like fog; books murmur when your back is turned. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Ask for wise counsel

success.narration: 'Seek what sings between ticks,' he says, nodding toward Hogsmeade.

failure.narration: He smiles sadly and changes the subject.

choices.option: Analyze the pigments for temporal residue

success.narration: Faint residue hums in the blue—someone moved the portrait recently.

failure.narration: No measurable trace; only exquisite paint.

scenes.title: On the Hogsmeade Path
scenes.description: Wind scrapes frost from fence posts; storefront lights flicker in the wrong order.
scenes.background: Stone smells of rain and ink; the castle’s bones creak with remembered footsteps. Branches knit overhead; moonlight slips between leaves like silver secrets.

choices.option: Keep a steady pace, eyes on distant lights

success.narration: Your breath finds a rhythm that the path accepts.

failure.narration: You hesitate at a fork, losing time.

choices.option: Jog to warm up and beat the chill

success.narration: Blood warms courage.

failure.narration: A stitch nags your side.

scenes.title: The Three Broomsticks
scenes.description: Madam Rosmerta serves something hot. Conversations skip—laughter arrives late.
scenes.background: Stone smells of rain and ink; the castle’s bones creak with remembered footsteps.

choices.option: Charm the room for gossip (Performance)

success.narration: You carry a tune; gossip flows about an old hourglass sale.

failure.narration: Your voice cracks adorably; fewer tongues wag.

choices.option: Quietly eavesdrop from a corner

success.narration: You piece together talk of the Hog's Head and a 'clock-mad collector'.

failure.narration: A chair scrape draws eyes your way.

scenes.title: The Hog’s Head
scenes.description: A gruff nod from Aberforth. The goat sneeze happens twice. 'If you’re chasing time, be sure it isn’t chasing you.'
scenes.background: Stone smells of rain and ink; the castle’s bones creak with remembered footsteps.

choices.option: Press for details with firm politeness

success.narration: He grunts a direction toward the Forbidden Forest.

failure.narration: He shrugs you off; you glean only the forest clue.

choices.option: Notice a scratched symbol on the bar

success.narration: It matches Flitwick’s notes—resonance anchor.

failure.narration: Only an old knot in the wood.

scenes.title: Forest Edge
scenes.description: Hagrid meets you at the treeline with a lantern. 'Forest’s actin’ strange. Mind yerself.'
scenes.background: Below the castle, gears of time grind softly; echoes arrive before their sounds. Branches knit overhead; moonlight slips between leaves like silver secrets.

choices.option: Ask Hagrid for safe paths

success.narration: He points out landmarks that don’t usually move.

failure.narration: He fusses; you plunge in with scant advice.

choices.option: Read moon and wind to choose the way

success.narration: The forest relaxes around your steps.

failure.narration: Branches argue; your cloak snags.

scenes.title: Runes Among the Roots
scenes.description: Time-twisted runes glow faintly on tree roots; some inscriptions read forward and backward at once.
scenes.background: Below the castle, gears of time grind softly; echoes arrive before their sounds. Branches knit overhead; moonlight slips between leaves like silver secrets.

choices.option: Decode the reversible syntax

success.narration: You translate: 'Anchor below.'

failure.narration: Meaning wriggles away; only impressions remain.

choices.option: Trace the pattern by feel (Attunement)

success.narration: A pulse answers in your bones, pointing downhill.

failure.narration: The pulse stutters; you press on anyway.

scenes.title: Hidden Undercroft
scenes.description: A stone door half-buried in roots. Carved above: an hourglass with one broken bulb.
scenes.background: Below the castle, gears of time grind softly; echoes arrive before their sounds. Branches knit overhead; moonlight slips between leaves like silver secrets. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Lift and clear the door with leverage

success.narration: Roots pop; the slab yawns inward.

failure.narration: Your shoulders burn; the gap is mean.

choices.option: Find the concealed latch

success.narration: A pressure-stone clicks; roots unknit.

failure.narration: You fumble; a thorn pricks deep.

scenes.title: The Timekeeper’s Undercroft
scenes.description: A corridor of arches opens on rooms that are versions of themselves from different days.
scenes.background: Below the castle, gears of time grind softly; echoes arrive before their sounds. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Move on the beats that feel 'right'

success.narration: You sync to the castle’s pulse.

failure.narration: Your timing slips; you get jostled by yesterday.

choices.option: Sprint through before rooms reconfigure

success.narration: You blur between possibles.

failure.narration: A doorframe nearly edits your sleeve out of existence.

scenes.title: Chamber of Borrowed Memories
scenes.description: Glass vials of memories float. Nearly Headless Nick drifts in, worried: 'Some students are forgetting themselves.'
scenes.background: Below the castle, gears of time grind softly; echoes arrive before their sounds. Dust hangs like fog; books murmur when your back is turned. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Ask Nick for testimonies and patterns

success.narration: He recalls odd gaps around the clocktower steps.

failure.narration: He dithers; you glean only a vague unease.

choices.option: Examine memory vials for distortion signatures

success.narration: Two vials hum alike—tower and forest link.

failure.narration: The vials blur; your eyes ache.

scenes.title: Echo Cellar
scenes.description: Footprints of different sizes overlay each other in dust, all yours.
scenes.background: Below the castle, gears of time grind softly; echoes arrive before their sounds. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Refuse the echo—center your will

success.narration: Your timeline firms; echoes quiet.

failure.narration: Doubt gnaws; footsteps overlap again.

choices.option: Map the footprints’ sequence logically

success.narration: A spiral path reveals a hidden stair.

failure.narration: The pattern loops; you go the long way round.

scenes.title: Gallery of Broken Gears
scenes.description: Great gears lie in alcoves like fossilized moons; some turn backward.
scenes.background: Below the castle, gears of time grind softly; echoes arrive before their sounds. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Leap gear to gear

success.narration: You keep your balance on teeth and spokes.

failure.narration: A slip bruises more than pride.

choices.option: Brace a jammed axle with a spike (Engineering)

success.narration: Your quick rig steadies the gallery.

failure.narration: The spike skitters; you dive aside.

scenes.title: The Bloody Baron’s Bridge
scenes.description: The Bloody Baron bars your way. 'The past is a chain,' he hisses.
scenes.background: Below the castle, gears of time grind softly; echoes arrive before their sounds. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Stand your ground with quiet respect

success.narration: He tilts his head and lets you pass in cold approval.

failure.narration: He glides through you; chills rattle your teeth.

choices.option: Pierce the ghost’s argument with insight

success.narration: You speak of mercy for the living; his chains ring softly.

failure.narration: Your words fall flat; the chains do not move.

scenes.title: Gate to the Timekeeper’s Labyrinth
scenes.description: An arch of numbered stones counts wrong. Beyond is a humming maze.
scenes.background: Below the castle, gears of time grind softly; echoes arrive before their sounds. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Enter on the count that 'feels' right (Attunement)

success.narration: The arch warms; the wrong numbers fade.

failure.narration: You slip sideways into a confusing loop.

choices.option: Compute a modular sequence to match the pattern

success.narration: Your math hums in tune with the arch.

failure.narration: The sequence jumps; you adjust too late.

scenes.title: Turns that Remember
scenes.description: Corridors rewind or skip ahead. Your shadow sometimes walks off without you.
scenes.background: Below the castle, gears of time grind softly; echoes arrive before their sounds. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Chase your shadow to learn the loop

success.narration: You catch it at a junction and fold it back to your heels.

failure.narration: You tire and the shadow slips laughing.

choices.option: Hold position, breathe, and wait for alignment

success.narration: The maze comes to you like a trained thestral.

failure.narration: Patience frays; the corridor jitters.

scenes.title: Heart of the Clock
scenes.description: A vast hourglass, cracked, bleeds glittering sand into midair. Your own older self flickers inside the glass, watching you.
scenes.background: Every breath tastes metallic as the clocktower heart beats out of rhythm. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Reach out with calm will to stabilize the flow

success.narration: The sand hums; the crack slows its creep.

failure.narration: The hum falters; the crack widens a hair.

choices.option: Recite the counter-charm perfectly

success.narration: The charm wraps the hourglass in clear glyphs.

failure.narration: A syllable wobbles; the glyphs stutter.

scenes.title: The Mirror of Yourself
scenes.description: Your future self steps out of the glass. 'We can only save one of us,' they say, voice like a ticking locket.
scenes.background: Every breath tastes metallic as the clocktower heart beats out of rhythm. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Argue for the present you (Persuasion)

success.narration: Future-you nods: 'Then do better than I did.'

failure.narration: They smirk: 'You’re not ready.'

choices.option: Refuse the dilemma; propose a third path

success.narration: Paradox becomes possibility for a breath.

failure.narration: Logic snarls; you both wince.

scenes.title: Four Trials of the Hour
scenes.description: Four pedestals light up: Mind, Body, Heart, Soul. Each demands proof.
scenes.background: Every breath tastes metallic as the clocktower heart beats out of rhythm. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Mind: Solve the rotating sigils

success.narration: They click into a quiet constellation.

failure.narration: They spin faster; sweat beads.

choices.option: Body: Hold the pendulum at the apex

success.narration: Your muscles sing and obey.

failure.narration: Your grip slips; sparks jump.

choices.option: Heart: Speak for those lost to time

success.narration: Portraits lean in to listen—and to help.

failure.narration: Your throat tightens; words come late.

choices.option: Soul: Let the hour sing through you (Willpower)

success.narration: You become a steady bell against the storm.

failure.narration: The note wavers; resolve costs you.

scenes.title: Binding or Reset
scenes.description: Glyphs circle the hourglass. Dumbledore’s portrait watches gravely from a nearby frame.
scenes.background: Every breath tastes metallic as the clocktower heart beats out of rhythm. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Bind the crack with rune-law

success.narration: The glyph-chain cinches tight.

failure.narration: A link slips; you push harder next step.

choices.option: Reset the flow to a safer past

success.narration: Sand melts into golden mist and reforms steadily.

failure.narration: Your chest hollows with the pull of time.

scenes.title: The Choice Echoes
scenes.description: Portraits gather: McGonagall, Flitwick, and even Phineas Nigellus. The castle waits for your final proof.
scenes.background: Every breath tastes metallic as the clocktower heart beats out of rhythm. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Proclaim hope and unity for the school

success.narration: A cheer rises in every frame; the gears ease.

failure.narration: Your words land in mismatched seconds.

choices.option: Demonstrate precise control with a final charm

success.narration: The hands of every clock align to the same soft tick.

failure.narration: A tremor ripples; some clocks refuse to agree.

choices.option: Offer your own future to seal the breach

success.narration: Time accepts your devotion like a vow.

failure.narration: Time hesitates, unconvinced by half-measures.

scenes.title: Ending: The Restored Timeline
scenes.description: Dawn over Hogwarts feels fresh and whole. McGonagall’s smile is tired and proud. The castle hums in one voice.
scenes.background: Every breath tastes metallic as the clocktower heart beats out of rhythm.

choices.option: Exhale and watch the sun strike the lake

success.narration: A quiet triumph settles in your bones.

scenes.title: Ending: The Fractured Reality
scenes.description: The castle is safe, but the portraits remember two versions of you. Some corridors greet you a heartbeat too early.
scenes.background: Every breath tastes metallic as the clocktower heart beats out of rhythm. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Accept the strangeness with grace

success.narration: You make peace with the double-echo of your footsteps.

scenes.title: Ending: The Eternal Loop
scenes.description: The hourglass resets. You are there when the candles first light, and there when they fade—always almost ready to begin again.
scenes.background: Every breath tastes metallic as the clocktower heart beats out of rhythm. The air ticks; shadows stretch a fraction too slow.

choices.option: Hold onto a single unbroken memory

success.narration: A smile from a friend becomes your north star.
